attributes.action: Ask the British people to vote in a referendum on democratic government in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having a permanent head of state that is unelected is totally unacceptable and certainly not democratic in the 21st. Century. Monarchy should be confined to the history books forever.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
